short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Prevents spoilers on IMDb reviews pages.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Guard your viewing experience with the powerful Anti Spoiler browser extension! This ingenious tool, driven by cutting-edge artificial intelligence, shields you from unwanted plot revelations when navigating IMDb review pages. Bid farewell to accidental spoilers and preserve the thrill of your favorite movies and TV shows.

Key Features:
AI-Powered Protection: Anti Spoiler harnesses the latest advancements in artificial intelligence to analyze and filter out potential spoilers from IMDb reviews. Its smart algorithms understand context, ensuring a seamless browsing experience while keeping spoilers at bay.

Seamless Integration: Effortlessly integrate Anti Spoiler into your browser for a hassle-free experience. Compatible with popular browsers, this extension works behind the scenes to safeguard your entertainment journey without interrupting your regular IMDb browsing.
